programme.desc: The Seaweed Sway / Flow Bros - Baby Shark and William meet the fin-credible rap icon Sharki B who created the dance craze, 'The Seaweed Sway'. // When Chucks leads a precious bubble across the ocean, the typically carefree seahorse learns the importance of watching where you flow.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep107
programme.desc: The Treasure of El Bravo - After Enrique steals the heart of El Bravo, there's only one person who can help Santi and crew save the day: Toms's younger sister, Prima Tina!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S2 Ep218
programme.desc: Pig Island - When Barbarito swipes the Windless Sail from Pig Island, the crew teams up their new pig friends to retrieve it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep408
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Helicopter - Miss Rabbit takes Peppa and her family for a ride in her rescue helicopter.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep409
programme.desc: Baby Alexander - Baby Alexander is too young to talk, until Peppa teaches him his first word.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep410
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Lighthouse - Granddad Dog takes Peppa, George and Danny Dog to visit Grampy Rabbit's lighthouse.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep411
programme.desc: Miss Rabbit's Day Off - Miss Rabbit has hurt her ankle, so her sister and her friends offer to fill in for her at the ice cream stand, the supermarket and everywhere else she works!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep414
programme.desc: The Secret Club - Suzy and Peppa start a Secret Agent Club going on secret missions, and doing secret things. In secret. But soon everyone wants to join!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches - The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep503
programme.desc: The Island of Lost Treasure - Somewhere, on The Island of Lost Treasure, there are incredible riches just waiting to be discovered. And Blaze and Darington are determined to be the first to find them!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep504
programme.desc: Babysitting Heroes - Blaze and AJ are helping their friend Stripes look after some baby animals, when the little critters accidentally float away on big bubbles. Now, it's up to these three babysitters to find their adorable animal friends and save the day!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep302
programme.desc: Pups Save a Goldrush / Pups Save the Paw Patroller - When a grizzled old prospector discovers gold in Adventure Bay, its a bona fide, dog gone, gold rush! // When Mayor Humdinger and the Kit-tastrophe Crew try to steal the Paw Patroller, the chase becomes a rescue!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Pups Save the Soccer Game / Pups Save a Lucky Collar - Mayor Humdinger challenges the Adventure Bay team to a soccer match, and Ryder and the Paw Patrol are called in to play. // The Paw Patrol must work as a team to overcome some dirty tricks by Mayor Humdinger and pull out a victory!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank / Lagoon Lemonade - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark. // When a heatwave strikes, Baby and William supply the town with Grandpa's world famous Lemonade.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep114
programme.desc: Coach Grandma - Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Let Justice Be done / The Great Spring Clean - Barbabeau forgot to return his book to the library. As Mr Strict the librarian is visiting Barbapapa today, Barbabeau decides to run away. // Barbamama wants the barbababies to tidy their bedrooms. They're hiding to escape the drudgery.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S4 Ep414
programme.desc: The Wizard of Skidoo - Welcome to the wonderful world of Skidooland! As we head down the stripey brick road on our quest to get home, we'll meet Rainbow Puppy the Kind Witch, Tinbox, and even the Wizard of Skidoo himself- Steve!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand - After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep118
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dance Floor - Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep505
programme.desc: Abra-Ka-Pickle! - Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo - After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: A Shark Day's Night / Bad Hank - The Tentacools get caught up in the trappings of being rock starfishes and forget that they formed the band to have fun. // When Hank discovers his friends are going easy on him during dodge bubble, he sets out to become a tough fishy like Shadow.

programme.title: Bossy Bear S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Dad's Day Off / Scout's Honor / The Magic Word - Bossy and Bissy run errands with Dad. // Bossy and Turtle learn its okay to ask for help. // Bossy and Turtle learn about the word "please".

programme.title: PAW Patrol S3 Ep304
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol / Pups Save a Lost Tooth - Impressed by the Paw Patrol's rescues, Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol, recruitng Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny. // Alex loses his first tooth, then really loses it.The tooth must be located before the Tooth Fairy comes!

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep907
programme.desc: PupsSolve the Mystery of the Missing Art - When all the paintings mysteriously disappear from the Art Museum festival, the PAW Patrol must solve the Missing Art Mystery and return all the paintings.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep119
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Lemonade Stand - After the Crew builds a special lemonade stand for Lucas and Lily, a sour Speed Meister sends it rolling through Builder Cove!

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S1 Ep118
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Dance Floor - Grandpa Gravel teaches Charger all his best moves for the big dance contest. But will a runaway disco ball cost them first place?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep404
programme.desc: Sun, Sea and Snow - Peppa and her friends and family are looking forward to a trip to the beach where they can make sandcastles, but when they arrive at the beach there is too much snow!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep405
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig's Computer - Mummy Pig gives her old PC to Granny and Grandpa Pig. Will they be able to use it?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep406
programme.desc: Hospital - Peppa and her playgroup friends go with Madame Gazelle to visit Pedro Pony, who is in hospital with a broken leg.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep147
programme.desc: Super Hero Teacher - Froga is so enamored with Super-Christopher, she decides that she wants to learn how to become Super-Froga! Christopher takes on the challenge of being her superhero instructor and after a rocky start, the two become terrific super partners.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep148
programme.desc: An Endless Story - Anna is reading Christopher and Froga a story - but when she gets to the end, they discover the last two pages are missing! After a search for the missing pages, they find out that one of them is blank.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep102
programme.desc: Washing - Po eats Tubby Custard and gets a messy bib. Po washes the bib clean and hangs it out to dry before eating more Tubby Custard with Tinky Winky, Dipsy and Laa-Laa.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep7
programme.desc: Sheep - Dee encourages a friend to say 'sheep' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different sheep - a white sheep, a baa-ing sheep, a leaping sheep and a noodle sheep.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Jurassic Pop - A new museum opens, so Zip and his friends try to find a fossil for the display.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep35
programme.desc: Messy Antics - During Mayor Oki's birthday picnic, Messy and friends get in trouble with Zam's shrinkasizer! Time to solve these OKIDO antics!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Best Bike in the World - When Monty gets a new bike, he must say goodbye to his old one. He wonders why you have to let go of things when you outgrow them.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep50
programme.desc: Shaun - Bluey and Bingo want a pet. To show them how much work they'd be in for, Dad gets to transform his hand into their old friend Shaun, a chaotic, undisciplined Emu with a taste for trouble.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep37
programme.desc: The Dos and Don'ts Badge - The Squirrels are causing a bit too much mess in the clubhouse, so Duggee explains that they need to think more carefully about what they are doing.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep36
programme.desc: The Exercise Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels set off on a warm-up run together. The Squirrels are feeling sleepy, but they are told that a bit of exercise will wake them up!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S4 Ep35
programme.desc: The Music Video Badge - The Squirrels are having fun playing a song they made, but they wish that they could see themselves perform. Duggee has a great suggestion, and they learn how to be creative.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep47
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Volcanic Island - Grandmaster Glitch is drilling near an underwater volcano in the ocean beside Academy Island in search of some hot bubbly mud.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep46

programme.desc: The Hub with Wang Guan covers hot-button geopolitical and economic issues, as well as interesting stories and trends in culture, education, technology and lifestyle. It aims to connect people, cultures and societies across the East and the West. The program features dynamic designs, fast pace and rich visuals to keep viewers engaged. It also makes use of trending topics online, while focusing on whats relevant in China and the world.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC276AdesanyavsCannonieris
programme.desc: It was a night for Aussies at UFC 276 as Israel Adesanya defended his title against Jared Cannonier and Alexander Volkanovski faced Max Holloway for the third time. See the entire main card, and more, on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep2
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep2
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC 297: Strickland vs. Du Plessis
programme.desc: Prelims - Fresh from one of 2023s most impressive performances, Sean Strickland will defend his UFC middleweight title for the first time on January 21, as he travels to Torontos Scotiabank Arena to battle South African slugger Dricus Du Plessis in the main event of UFC 297. Stricklands upset of Israel Adesanya came as no surprise to those in the new champs gym, and now hell look to cement his place atop the 185-pound weight class by defeating Du Plessis, who is perfect in six UFC fights. Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.

Plus, a new champion will be crowned in the womens bantamweight division, as Raquel Pennington squares off with Mayra Bueno Silva in a co-main event that promises fireworks.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night Ankalaev vs Walker 2
programme.desc: Prelims - A controversial score will be settled at the APEX in Las Vegas on January 14, and this time, light heavyweight contenders Magomed Ankalaev and Johnny Walker will have five rounds to handle their business in a UFC Fight Night main event. A no contest in the pairs October bout left many unanswered questions and, this time, the Russian powerhouse and the dynamic Brazilian striker square off in a rematch, with both determined to dominate and make their case for a shot at the 205-pound title

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep2

Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
